roleset.name: allow a luxury

example.name: love this example
example.text: Meanwhile, the pimp Pompey (Glen Allen Pruett), dressed in black leather and a prominent codpiece, indulges in enough obscene gestures and pelvic thrusts to launch a space probe.
example.arg: dressed in black leather and a prominent codpiece
in enough obscene gestures and pelvic thrusts to launch a space probe

example.name: unstated luxury
example.text: [The Newport Beach operators]-1 also tend *trace*-1 to indulge themselves privately.

roleset.note: No Vncls, No FN. Checked by Julia, 10/2010.
